metaTitle: Christmas craft pack | The Christmas Elf
metaContent: Christmas craft pack containing a wooden Christmas shape, decorative paper, 2 colours of glitter, 3 different bags of pretties to add some sparkle, a mixture of sequins, gems, Pom poms and mini wooden shapes.

product.title: Christmas craft pack
product.caption: Christmas Craft Pack
info: Just add your own glue (paint if you want to) and you are good to go.
Shapes available: Tree, Reindeer, Snowflake, Snowman and Star.
product.smallPrint: These are not suitable for under 3 years old and should always be supervised by an adult due to small pieces.
productInfo: 3 different bags of pretties to add some sparkle
A mixture of sequins, Gems, Pom Poms and mini Wooden shapes
